channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Profile Box Shortcode And Widget
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Profile Box Shortcode And Widget

item.title: CVE-2024-1401|2024-03-19T14:28:21.065Z -- Unknown -- Profile Box Shortcode And Widget
item.description: The Profile Box Shortcode And Widget WordPress plugin before 1.2.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
